ai-ja403:1.4_0: Why don’t you beg from me?”
ai-ja403:2.3_0: That’s why I do not beg from you;
ai-ja403:3.2_0: if she is not asked for the right time;
ai-ja403:4.1_0: But one who lives way of livelihood
ai-ja403:4.2_0: For when begged the time is asked,
ai-ja403:4.4_0: A mendicant personally lives off oneself,
ai-ja403:5.2_0: Having seen (that), the Lord of the World gained faith in the vicinity of the Sākāmī,
ai-ja403:5.3_0: though I was living the spiritual life,
ai-ja403:6.2_0: for the wise one who feels them.
ai-ja403:7.2_0: Going along a thousand times came to Laṅkā,
ai-ja403:7.3_0: For how is a noble disciple?
ai-ja403:7.4_0: Having heard the verse found in the Dhamma.”
